data.md:MetaData: Pollen profile BASR, La Grande Basse, France
No laminations. Local vegetation: fen. Core diameter: 6 cm. Area: 0.5 ha. Peat bog. Physiography: valley-bottom. Surrounding vegetation: Abies-Fagus forest.

A three thousand year succession of plant communities on a valley bottom in the Vosges Mountains, NE France, reconstructed from fossil pollen, plant macrofossils, and modern phytosociological communities
